arts.ttl: QPR v Sheffield Wednesday player ratings
arts.sum: QPR’s winning run was brought to an abrupt end as Sheffield Wednesday beat them 2-0 at Loftus Road. Here’s how we rated each Rangers player. Paul Nardi: 7 Produced fine saves to deny Josh Windass and Michael Ihiekwe but was left badly exposed for Wednesday’s goals. arts.ttl: ‘One of the best in the league’ - QPR boss Cifuentes reacts to Ilias Chair signing new contract
arts.sum: Marti Cifuentes is looking forward to seeing Ilias Chair back to his best after the attacker signed a new long-term contract at QPR. “There are areas in the club that we can keep working on and, as all the teams in the world, we analyse all the situation in the market,” explained Cifuentes.

arts.ttl: Cifuentes: There must be no culture of excuses at QPR
arts.sum: Marti Cifuentes refused to blame QPR’s below-par performance against Sheffield Wednesday on fatigue. The 2-0 home defeat came after two long away trips in the space of a few days, to Plymouth and then Hull. But head coach Cifuentes insisted: “That’s not where my focus is, otherwise I think we can create a culture of […] The post Cifuentes: There must be no culture of excuses at QPR appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: Sheffield Wednesday return to winning ways by beating QPR
arts.sum: Michael Smith and Callum Paterson netted for the Owls.

arts.ttl: QPR’s winning run ends with home loss to Wednesday
arts.sum: QPR’s winning run came to an abrupt end at Loftus Road. Goals from Michael Smith and Callum Paterson gave Sheffield Wednesday victory. Smith struck on 72 minutes, shortly after coming on as a substitute , and Paterson’s 88th-minute goal sealed the Owls’ win. For the opener, Barry Bannan delivered a superb diagonal ball into […] The post QPR’s winning run ends with home loss to Wednesday appeared first on West London Sport.

arts.ttl: “You don’t forget matches like that” – Joey Pelupessy on how Sheffield Wednesday has left a mark on him
arts.sum: Joey Pelupessy has spoken to the Dutch media about his career and his time with Sheffield Wednesday. Pelupessy spent three seasons at Hillsborough following his transfer in 2018 from Heracles Almelo. Speaking to Het Belang van Limburg, the 31-year-old was asked about his time with Sheffield Wednesday and it’s clearly an important period for him. The post “You don’t forget matches like that” – Joey Pelupessy on how Sheffield Wednesday has left a mark on him appeared first on Sport Witness.

arts.ttl: Richards situation ‘definitely not optimal’ – QPR boss
arts.sum: Marti Cifuentes has admitted the situation with Taylor Richards is ‘definitely not optimal’ after Cambridge United made it clear they want to return the player to QPR. The League One club want to scrap the season-long loan for Richards agreed during the summer. They can only do so if Rangers agree. arts.ttl: Cifuentes ‘very down’ after ‘big setback’ for QPR man
arts.sum: Marti Cifuentes has spoken of his sadness at QPR defender Jake Clarke-Salter facing another lengthy spell on the sidelines. The centre-back, 27, has been plagued by injuries since being signed during the summer of 2022 after leaving Chelsea.
